DESCRIPTION: An enemy is empowered if it has any Strength, Regenerate, Metallicize, or increased Max Health.
Randomly receive increased gold, increased chance of finding rare cards, increased Max HP, or upgrade a random card in your deck.
When you inscribe #b2 #yGlyphs, trigger their effects and remove them. A matching pair increases the strength of the effect.
If you have exactly #b5 cards in hand when you play this, trigger the effect.
At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to your #yBulwark then reduce it by half.
You may only have one #yHoly #yWeapon power active at a time. Playing a new one will replace the previous.
Deals #b4 damage to ALL enemies when paired. If matched with another #yJustice, deal #b10 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain #b3 #yBulwark when paired. If matched with another #yFortitude, gain #b8 #yBulwark.
Gain #b5 #yVigor when paired. If matched with another #yValor, gain #b8 #yVigor and #b2 #yStrength.
Draw #b1 card when paired. If matched with another #yZeal, gain [E] and draw #b2 cards.
Gain #b4 Block when paired. If matched with another #yCharity, gain #b8 Block and remove all of your debuffs.
